document.heading: Realty Violations Correction Fund Act of 1979

history.narrative: Law 3-45, the “Realty Violations Correction Fund Act of 1979,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 3-136, which was referred to the Committee on Housing and Economic Development. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on September 25, 1979, and October 23, 1979, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on November 9, 1979, it was assigned Act No. 3-123 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
